Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer during the sixth inning.
Cleveland's bullpen combined for seven innings of four-hit ball after Ben Lively departed with a leg injury.
Chicago White Sox were shut out for the 17th time this season.
Chicago White Sox dropped a franchise-record 14th straight home game.
Post-Match Reflections: Sean Burke reflected on his major league debut, stating, 'It’s been a little bit of a roller coaster. But it all paid off and I think everything happens for a reason. I’m just happy to be here now.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ben Lively was hit on the outside of his right leg by Dominic Fletcher’s liner, leading to his departure from the game.
Cleveland's bullpen began the day with a 36-11 record and a major league-best 2.80 ERA.
